00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORCOMPLETIONCOUNTER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORCOMPLETIONCOUNTER_H
00024 
00025 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"
00026 
00027 namespace Hypertable {
00028 
00035   class TableMutatorCompletionCounter {
00036   public:
00037     TableMutatorCompletionCounter() : m_outstanding(0), m_retries(false), m_errors(false), m_done(false) { }
00038 
00039     void set(size_t count) { 
00040       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00041       m_outstanding = count;
00042       m_done = (m_outstanding == 0) ? true : false;
00043       m_errors = m_retries = false;
00044     }
00045 
00046     void decrement() {
00047       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00048       assert(m_outstanding);
00049       m_outstanding--;
00050       if (m_outstanding == 0) {
00051         m_done = true;
00052         m_cond.notify_all();
00053       }
00054     }
00055 
00056     bool wait_for_completion(Timer &timer) {
00057       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00058       boost::xtime expire_time;
00059 
00060       boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00061       expire_time.sec += (int64_t)timer.remaining();
00062 
00063       while (m_outstanding) {
00064         if (!m_cond.timed_wait(lock, expire_time))
00065           throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT);
00066       }
00067 
00068       return !(m_retries || m_errors);
00069     }
00070 
00071     void set_retries() { m_retries = true; }
00072     
00073     void set_errors() { m_errors = true; }
00074 
00075     bool has_retries() { return m_retries; }
00076 
00077     bool has_errors() { return m_errors; }
00078 
00079     void clear_errors() { m_errors = false; }
00080 
00081     bool is_complete() { return m_done; }
00082 
00083   private:
00084     boost::mutex m_mutex;
00085     boost::condition m_cond;
00086     size_t m_outstanding;
00087     bool m_retries;
00088     bool m_errors;
00089     bool m_done;
00090   };
00091 
00092 }
